---
title: "My GitHub Repositories"
format: html
---

Below is a live list of all my public GitHub repositories.

<div id="repo-list">
  <p>Loading...</p>
</div>

<script>
async function loadRepos() {
  const container = document.getElementById("repo-list");
  const response = await fetch("https://api.github.com/users/lmacakova/repos?per_page=100&sort=updated");
  const repos = await response.json();

  const list = document.createElement("ul");
  repos.forEach(repo => {
    const li = document.createElement("li");
    li.innerHTML = `<a href="${repo.html_url}" target="_blank">${repo.name}</a> â€“ ${repo.description || "No description"}`;
    list.appendChild(li);
  });

  container.innerHTML = "";
  container.appendChild(list);
}

loadRepos();
</script>
